name: Port Reusable Scripts Between Repositories
description: Port and generalize reusable scripts between repositories with proper adaptations, dependency elimination, and Python path setup. Achieved zero external dependencies by rewriting PyGithub to gh CLI.
author: ProjectScylla
use_cases: Port utility scripts from one repository to another
Build shared tooling foundation across multiple repos
Eliminate heavy dependencies by rewriting to CLI tools
Modernize legacy scripts to Python 3.10+ standards
Organize large script migrations into sequential PRs
context: Port 17 scripts from ProjectOdyssey to ProjectScylla, removing Mojo/ML content and adding Scylla evaluation framework specifics
outcome: SUCCESS - All 17 scripts ported across 5 PRs, zero dependencies added, all work without PYTHONPATH
